title: Smoosh1800
author: Smoosh1800
content: WELCOME TO THE BIRD COINSplit the Profits with YOU!*Currently preparing for registration with CoinMarketCap, coingecko, etc.The Bird Coin is a deflationary token built on the Binance smart chain.It has auto-locked liquidity, reflection distribution and research and development built into its smart contract.EVERY ORDER OF THE BIRDPUTS MORE COINS IN YOUR WALLET!YOU GET 5% REFLECTIONSFROM EACH TRANSACTION!The more you hold, the more you earn.THE BIRD HAS AUTO-LOCK LIQUIDITY5% Is Locked Away for 5 years.THREE PERCENT SUPPORTSRESEARCH and DEVELOPMENT ofBlockchain * Robotics & Aerospace.THIS COIN BUILD INCREDIBLE THINGS!Our R&D Funds...・Blockchain Technology・Aerospace Infrastructure・and Robotic DevelopmentThis year (THEBIRD) will create the first Robotics company built entirely by a meme cryptocurrency. This little meme coin will fund development and production of robots in every size and shape.◆The Bird AEROSPACE division willPatent systems that remove space junkDesign low-earth orbit habitatsCreate hydrogen fuel & breathable oxygen from waterThe Bird Coin funds this exciting aerospace research and development, including lunar development! ◆Our ROBOTICS team isProducing Nano-Bots and giant construction RobotsTeaching and Medical assistantsFood and Service-BotsCompanion and Safety-BotsCIRCULATION/SUPPLYOn launch day, March 20th, 2022, The Bird Corporation locked pre-sale funds along with corporate funds into The Bird LP and destroyed 41% of the total circulation of (THEBIRD) by sending them to the BSC burn wallet! Those coins will never be circulated again. No other coins will be minted.The LP is locked for 5 years so you can feel secure your investment in the (THEBIRD) is long-term. The Bird Coin smart contract will not be upgraded or altered over time. No V2 shall be issued.TOTAL SUPPLY of THE BIRD69,000,000,000,000,000,000,000SENT TO BURN WALLET ON LAUNCH DAY 28,290,000,000,000,000,000,000CIRCULATING SUPPLY AT LAUNCH32,568,000,000,000,000,000,000THE BIRD CONTRACT ADDRESS0x254b2575E96466d5C75f5A6F9913c9960A9EAe012022 RoadmapStage 1 - COMPLETE1. The Bird Corporation is created 07 January 2022.2. Bird recruits development team.3. The Bird Coin is hatched on Binance Smart Chain.4. Twelve industrial divisions are created.5. Contract LP is LOCKED for 5 years.6. Website and White paper released.Stage 21. 30 Day Pre-sale Campaign offering.2. Release multi-language social media and news.3. Full coin launch began May 20, 20224. Bird NFT Design Competition begins June 1.5. NFT Auction - Artist Merchandise Drop.6. Aerospace BOSS Coin Project Announcement Q2Stage 31. Bird Robotics Division Coin (r) Introduced Q32. Robotics Design Competition Begins3. Release of HOOT & OWL Blockchain Q44. Bird Entertainment (x) Coin Introduced Q45. Global Relief Fund Announcement6. $50,000 Robotics Design AnnouncedTHE BIRD TEAM(THEBIRD) coin was developed on March 31, 2022 by The Bird Corporation of Nevada.CCO/DEVELOPER - Zane DurantCFO/DEVELOPER - Kelly DurantCTO/DEVELOPER-Shane SzathmaryHPhttps://thebirdcoin.com/Twitterhttps://twitter.com/ZaneDurantTelegramhttps://t.me/TheBirdCoinLoungeDiscordhttps://discord.gg/vaJcmHZeKwReddithttps://www.reddit.com/r/thebirdcoin/There is currently a #Giveaway event on Twitter due to volunteer efforts.Search Twitter for tags #TheBirdCoin #THEBIRD, etc.

We have burned 42% of supply.5. The contract is renounced.#THEBIRD #investor■Tweet Link Addresshttps://twitter.com/ZaneDurant/status/1538886579267088384?s=20&t=BX9m6ULGMtKB9pSVlxU5hg

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Your aerospace and robotics goals are great but do you have private backing for this project?Because if you are depending in public sale is quite difficult these days. You need to find serious investors if you do really want to move forward.People will be interested with giveaways and other promos, but then what?And one more thing, will the team members disclose their identity?After all, they will be exploring the world of aerospace and robotics.

comments.author: Moshen
comments.body: Yeah when u bring up the subject of monetary backing they always fall short of explanation whether they have money to put where their mouth is. Venture capital exists but tends to recant doing business with low-lifes. And if theres no capital underneath ur venture its a ponzi. Im just calling things their names. The bird coin should be scragged and used for making meat cream for daubing upon ur sandwich in the morn.

comments.author: Smoosh1800
comments.body: The Bird Corporation Is Building a Better Worldwith Innovations in...https://thebirdcoin.com/The-Bird-Corporation/gaming.htmlTHE BIRD CORPORATION: P2E GAMINGWe've come a long way from Mario Bros, but I still love it... what if you could earn real coin every time he jumped on a yellow coin? Now you can -- when you play games built on the Bird Blockchain.Everyone has a gaming device in the palm of their hands. Our phones are portable gaming devices, and soon VR devices will take over as the main way we play games and interact with others online. Bird games and educational applications are P2E games which rewards players with real cryptocurrency when they learn a skill or correctly complete a task. Our first game is slated for released in Q3 2022.The Bird Corporation is fully funding our gaming and VR division with the development and future sale of an industry specific cryptocurrency we are currently calling (g) for reference. All game development will be funded thorough the trading of this coin. A small fee will be attached to each transaction. 5% will be assigned for locked liquidity, 4% for gaming development, 3% reward for (g) coin holders, 1% reward for The Bird Coin Holders.GAME & APPLICATION DEVELOPMENTThe Bird Corporation is building a team of UI/UX developers working on several projects including Virtual Reality, The Metaverse, NFT Staking, Educational, and first person and multi-player P2E games. These Bird Apps will be available in 2022. We develop simultaneously on multiple platforms to provide flexibility and faster deployment of Bird products.P2E GAMESOur P2E Gaming Line will turn first person shooter games into shoot for pay games. Hit the target - you earn a coin! We will bring back the thrill of driving games with an exciting new Robot Rider game. Run over the right human on your way to robot school to earn crypto!Our construction themed apps pay gamers for completing tasks such as digging and pouring the proper amount of concrete into a form or installing drywall with the proper number of screws. Our Farm gamers earn by preparing soil, planting seeds, watering crops, pulling weeds, harvesting fruits and vegetables, and packing and marketing products.EDUCATIONALOur Educational Line is creating new and exciting ways of learning foreign languages, mathematics, history, science, and technical skills while earning The Bird cryptocurrency. Children will learn and earn from home. Daily info drops and frequent testing reinforce skills resulting in payment to Bird Wallet accounts. Any educational topic can be adapted into this model. Bird Apps will offer P2E courses to online schools and colleges.VR PROJECTS - BIRDSEYE VIEWERBirds Eye View is under development by The Bird Corporation. This 360-degree VR helmet will wirelessly connect the user to The Metaverse or any gaming application offering a sight, sound, temperature control, and smell. The Birds Eye View uses eye track/blink mechanism for selecting objects. Bird applications will include VR integration and standard play options.METAVERSE DEVELOPMENTThe Metaverse is not a game platform, it's a new internet, a new nightclub, a place to meet up. You can sell products, learn things, even live on another planet. The Bird Corporation is building a new Metaverse Project called (m) which gives you free of charge (redacted) and (redacted). You will earn cryptocurrency for spending time here. You can rent your land.NFT SALES AND PRODUCTIONThe Bird Corporation is working in collaboration with artists from around the world to bring you the finest NFT options available. The artists we work with earn 50% of income from the sale of their NFT's. The remaining profits are injected into The Bird Coin LP. They also receive a percentage of each item sold from the Bird Merchandise Store.Bird Application developers are building an NFT staking application where investors can earn compound interest on their NFT pairs.Developers are also working on an NFT series of (x) for our Metaverse (m). These (x) will have the ability to mate with other (x) for rarity. We also are creating land plots for our (x2) metaverse project which will act as a deed to actual profits from the Bird Global Relief Fund.Thank you for buying THEBIRD coin. You will be notified when (g) coin is available for pre-sale. All wallets participating in the pre-sale of (g) will receive a (g) coin NFT. When you buy (g) during the pre-sale you will be purchasing (g) coin, with BNB. (g) will be part of THEBIRD eco-system.THE BIRD CORPORATION BUILDS INCREDIBLE!The Bird Coin can be purchased with Meta Mask or a Trust Wallet app. You can also use an internet browser to purchase on Pancake Swap with this official contract address:0x254b2575E96466d5C75f5A6F9913c9960A9EAe01The Bird Coin secures your investment by charging a small fee on each transaction.5% of that fee is placed in a 5-year locked liquidity pool which stabilizes the coin price and creates liquidity for expanding to other exchanges.Active wallets receive 5% reward "reflections" on each transaction. We recommend buying two bags of The Bird Coin, one to day trade and one to hold long term.The Bird Coin also has a deflationary burn mechanism which reduces overall supply over time.3% of each transaction automatically funds research and development projects listed on this web site developed by The Bird Corporation.#Blockchain #TheBirdCoin #THEBIRD #reward #P2E #Metaverse #NFT #staking #MetaMask #TrustWallet #Pancake #Swap

comments.author: Smoosh1800
comments.body: The Bird Coin Report — Day 35https://medium.com/@zanedurant1/the-bird-coin-report-day-35-e7c4b8f04986It’s been a wild ride this last 35 days. We’ve launched a new cryptocurrency, hit an amazing record high, funded three industrial divisions, and created a marketing wallet fat enough to choke an elephant. So, what’s the plan now? Some of our investors have asked that question, and I am going to try and answer that question here.Marketing a product is multifaceted. It takes several forms these days. One of the many forms is social media. Over the first 35 days, we have used the big three social media outlets (Twitter, Facebook, and Reddit) to spread the word about THEBIRD. Their built-in algorithms make it possible to reach certain markets with targeted information, so we have utilized this to our advantage in Japan, Dubai, in Australia, Canada, and in the U.S.Our social marketing continues to roll out in several other countries this month and will continue to expand over the next 12 months.Direct face-to-face marketing begins in July in Las Vegas and several other markets across the U.S. We are currently creating THEBIRD marketing materials and collectible memorabilia to hand out to the public by our newly trained staff of 18–25-year-old female marketing pros. They will target our male demographic with soft marketing information and investment data on city streets and in venues across America.There is only one venue in Las Vegas that we are interested in, and that’s Allegiant Stadium. We are moving forward with Lamar, who holds exclusive rights to the stadium advertising to see how and when we can add THEBIRD to the stadium in some way. Lamar also provides national billboard coverage across the U.S. and we will be discussing a national insertion as well.In other marketing, THEBIRD is going to be spreading the word through small market radio and television talk shows and podcasts. Radio time will be purchased in U.S, Canada, and other international markets as soon as September 1. We are also launching our own podcast called “Crypto After Dark — live from Las Vegas” which will talk about cryptocurrency, NFTs, and Blockchain. We will have interviews with the top developers about their projects, we will have top analysts looking at the numbers, making recommendations about projects, and we will have some fun as well. That starts in August.Our Merchandising Store opens in August. Don’t be fooled by cheap imitations. You can only buy real official merchandise at THEBIRD STORE online. All our merchandise funds THEBIRD LP. When you buy and wear official THEBIRD merchandise, you help market THEBIRD.Thank you for your questions about marketing THEBIRD. We appreciate your interest in our project.THEBIRD is a cryptocurrency created by The Bird Corporation of Nevada. We apply blockchain technology to industry. Please consult our website for details about future projects.#Blockchain #TheBirdCoin #THEBIRD #reward＃P2E #Metaverse #NFT #stakeing #MetaMask #TrustWallet #Pancake #Swap#Marketing #Tradeshows #Billboards #Radio #Merchandise

comments.author: Smoosh1800
comments.body: Veni, Vedi, Veci — THEBIRD Report from Las VegasAs Caesar once said, “Veni, Vidi, Vici”. We came to Las Vegas, we saw, and conquered. Advertising layouts, marketing projects, meetings with printers, conventions… all in 110-degree heat.This past month in Las Vegas has been an amazing experience. So much has happened in such a short span of time, I thought I would give you an update on our progress.ADVERTISINGWe were fortunate to meet with a top local advertising agency to handle our unique marketing situation. This company, with a long history in Las Vegas is putting together a 5-year plan to introduce THEBIRD to several markets across the US, Canada, and Latin America through Special Events, Radio, and Direct Media Placement. It seems their company meets most of our long-term targeted goals; we may have a formal announcement shortly. We are reaching out to other firms as well — to see what they might have to offer — as we seek out the best option to market THEBIRD globally.Over the next few months our corporate plans include extending our online message into Northern Africa, Europe, and South America. We will begin running print ads in several key markets at Sporting Events, on Buses, Trains, Subways, and in other high traffic areas. We will join the conversation on talk radio stations across the U.S. and Canada and begin late night radio, cable, and tv buys in small markets.ONLINE MEDIAWe are currently taking quotes on our website redesign, and on layouts for international advertising insertions, YouTube video production, and other online marketing proposals. If you are an online marketing company with a special product to offer, please send your proposal to contact@thebirdcoin.comMETAVERSE CONVENTIONOur direct marketing team hit the Las Vegas Convention Center this past weekend with hot off the press marketing materials. A lot of great connections were made. Two separate conventions were happening simultaneously, so we were able to reach a substantial number of first timers with the Bird message. We will schedule more events in the coming months especially during the cooler months.Our online footprint continues to expand. We are adding targeted marketing to Twitter and making additions to our Telegram with new moderators from all corners of the globe. If you have any time to volunteer, please join the conversation.NEW PROJECT ANNOUNCEMENTThank you for your continued support, we will have a special announcement soon. Stay tuned.THEBIRDMediumhttps://medium.com/@zanedurant1/veni-vedi-veci-thebird-report-from-las-vegas-d52f9701bc96#THEBIRD #BSC #BNB #BTC #ETH #Cryptocurency #PancakeSwap #PROJECT #MEDIA #METAVERSECONVENTION

comments.author: Smoosh1800
comments.body: THEBIRD ReportFor Investors of THEBIRDWe want to thank all the people who have invested in THEBIRD during our first phase of our launch. Those of you who purchased and held during this time will be very happy with this communique.A MEME CAN DO SOMETHINGIn our first two months of existence, THEBIRD has acquired more than 2000 long-term wallet holders during a worldwide economic downturn. Our message is taking hold. A meme coin can do something important. We can now begin — the burn.PLEASE TAKE NOTE OF THE FOLLOWING:We have completed our research and development fund drive for our Blockchain division, collecting all the R&D needed for our Hoot project. Thank you for buying THEBIRD. Your transactions have created a future generation of blockchain technology. Current wallet holders — Stay tuned for exciting details.Soon, we will begin burning (x) portion of our R&D fund to deflate the circulation and increase the value of THEBIRD… hold long-term for most rewards.MARKETING DETAILS1. A new website for THEBIRD is in production.2. New logos for THEBIRD have been designed for outdoor usage.3. Translations in Arabic for Northern Africa and The Middle East are completed!4. Researching Radio stations, Podcasts, and Publications for insertions.5. Beginning online marketing campaigns.TWITTER and TELEGRAMSocial media websites can be full of ignorant and foolish comments. Beware of online messaging from non-professionals. These ideas come from a place of fear and depression, not from wisdom or knowledge. Find a project that you believe in. Investigate. Find investments with locked liquidity. Do your own research, seek your own council. This is the time when wealth is made. Invest and hold.NEW PROJECTS — BIRD ENERGY (OTEC)World events have a way of changing your plans. A crisis has arisen — we need more energy as soon as possible — we cannot wait another moment to make a difference. With that in mind we are moving forward with our first Energy project which will focus on OTEC energy. This Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion is a constant renewable energy source. It’s amazing technology that we are proud to be part of.This week I moved forward and created a new coin called Bird Energy (OTEC) which will raise the funds needed to build and maintain The Bird OTEC Project. Our goal is to install this project somewhere off the east coast of Japan.A presale for Bird Energy (OTEC) will take place shortly. We hope to raise an estimated 300 BNB before launch which will place OTEC on several exchanges at once. OTEC project hopes to raise 100 million dollars for construction and offer electricity and water for drinking and agriculture at a net zero charge to the public.There will be several for profit industries spawned from this enterprise, which we will explain later, all of which benefit stockholders of The Bird Corporation, and THEBIRD. First funding round has begun.OTEC will have 5% locked liquidity, a renounced contract, and a high rate of reflections for investors.BIRD ENTERTAINMENTOur Entertainment division is set for development. Our project (h) which was scheduled to go live this month has been pushed back to allow OTEC to move forward. Outside investors may contact us if you are interested in our Bird Entertainment projects. We will move ahead with our entertainment sector before the Q4 which will include independent film, television and cartoon projects funded by a new (h) cryptocurrency. Independent film makers, directors, editors, production crews, writers, artists, animaters, and cartoonists are encouraged to follow this space. We will make fun!HOW TO INCREASE AWARENESSWe are marketing THEBIRD in several languages around the globe, moving into new markets every day. You can help spread the word too by teaching the people around you the difference between regular stocks options and cryptocurrencies.Show them THEBIRD. Teach them about locked liquidity, and reflections. Talk about building infrastructure. Show them our corporate website. Explain our future goals. Most of all explain how to track crypto — and buy when the price is low — about holding, and when to sell reflections.Let’s talk soon.Chirp!Mediumhttps://medium.com/@zanedurant1/thebird-report-50fcc3cdb678#THEBIRD #OTEC #BSC #BNB #BTC #ETH #Cryptocurency #PancakeSwap #PROJECT #MEDIA #MARKETING #TELEGRAM #MEME

comments.body: I ask again.What was the point of burning 42% of supply if no one had a chance to aquire some in the first place?I can make a mineable coin with 40 trillion pre-mine, let it mine 2 blocks then put 20 trillion into a burn wallet... does that make it more valuable? Short answer, NO. Explain what the purpose of burning 42% in the opening days?
